title: Sidewall, "Damask", 1948
creditline: Gift of Rath and Doodeheefver, Amsterdam
description: A Renaissance damask pattern. One large center motif. The match at the sides makes another less important motif. Pomegranates, foliation, ornamented bands and diaper patterns are used in the design. Printed in cream on bluish-gray ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, "Damask", 1948.
1948. Machine-printed. Gift of Rath and Doodeheefver, Amsterdam. 1948-100-4.
